fields.name: rocky-woodland-stream
fields.description: A calming scene of a rocky stream running through a small desolate wood land in Maine, USA. This was shot with a slightly slower shutter speed to capture the movement of the water. To encapsulate the viewer of being sat there by the stream, being able to hear the water; Envisioning being sat peacefully by the quiet stream.
